meta.name: Translate Text
meta.tagline: Adds a translate button to context menus when you select text. Interacts with the Google Translate API.
meta.description:
Select text, right click, and press Translate in the context menu.

Interactions with the Google Translate API.

Please note that results may vary from the official Google Translate website due to the extension using Google's older language models.
meta.changelog:
### 1.0.1
- Fixed errors.
- Increased font size for better readability.

translateTo.description: The language to translate the text to (ISO lang code).
